about_the_game:
Embark on an epic 3D adventure filled with magic, humor, and mysteries. You are a curious and brave duck exploring a fantasy world inhabited by strange and wonderful creatures, like talking bees, friendly dragons, and mischievous fairies. In this story, you will assist the inhabitants of these unique worlds by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and unraveling secrets in every corner.

From giant mushroom forests to crystal caves and floating meadows, each environment is intricately designed to immerse you in a world of vibrant colors and unique shapes.

The inhabitants of this universe are as diverse as their appearances. Meet artisan bees, guardian dragons, and playful fairies, each with their own personality and special missions that deepen the story.

Help the inhabitants solve their problems and unlock new areas. Complete challenges to collect special artifacts, discover hidden secrets, and unlock abilities that will take you further.

In a world where the unexpected is the norm, you, a duck, will be the hero that the fantasy inhabitants need. Dare to discover a universe full of charm, magic, and a touch of comedy.

Each mission will bring you closer to understanding the origin of this universe and why a simple duck can become the spark of hope that everyone needed. Get ready for an epic adventure full of magic, mystery, and plenty of feathers!

name: Pato Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
